Package org.graffiti.plugins.ios.exporters.gmlxml

Class GMLXMLWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.graffiti.plugins.ios.exporters.gmlxml.GMLXMLWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OutputSerializer, Serializer

    public class GMLXMLWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements OutputSerializer
    Provides a GML writer. This writer does not yet support all GML features yet. See http://infosun.fmi.uni-passau.de/Graphlet/GML/ for more details
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.8 $
